column4: Tax Day for Tax Year 2017 - Filing deadline and due date for Federal Income Tax Returns. Prepare and efile your 2017 tax return from early January-October 15, 2018 on efile.com.
Due dates for State Income Tax Returns vary by state. Prepare your 2017 state return from early January-October 15, 2018 with your Federal Return on efile.com.
Due date for Tax Extensions for 2017 Federal Income Tax Returns.  You can start preparing and efiling Your Extension mid-March 2018 on efile.com.
Due dates for State Income Tax Extensions vary by state.
Last day to efile a 2017 Federal Income Tax Return for Tax Extension filers. Prepare and efile your 2017 tax return from early January-October 15, 2018 on efile.com.

You can file an Amended Return to pay taxes due anytime, but you generally have a deadline of 3 years from the original due date to claim a tax refund.
 Start Amended Tax Return

You can file a Tax Return for a previous tax year anytime, but you can only claim a refund within 3 years of the original tax deadline. They can only be prepared and filed via mail. 
 Start Previous Year Tax Return
